scripts.build: npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push --skip-generate && tsc -p tsconfig.json || true && mkdir -p dist && if [ -f dist/src/index.js ]; then cp dist/src/index.js dist/index.js && cp -r dist/src/* dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && rm -rf dist/src; elif [ -f dist/index.js ]; then echo 'dist/index.js already exists'; else echo 'ERROR: dist/index.js not found after build'; exit 1; fi
